, also known as Kijū Yoshida, is a Japanese movie director and screenwriter.
He has directed more than 20 movies between 1960 and 2004. His movie "A Promise" was screened in the Un Certain Regard section the 1986 Cannes Film Festival. Two years later his movie "Wuthering Heights" would compete for the Golden Palm at the 1988 Festival.
He is married to actress Mariko Okada.
